statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 0.5
SELECT id, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.1 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM weather_data
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 10 ORDER BY date DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 50 AND temperature < 20 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 15 AND 25 AND humidity > 40 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT id, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND precipitation > 5 ORDER BY precipitation DESC, id ASC
SELECT id, date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 30 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT location_name, zipcode FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT id, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE zipcode = 12345;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > 70 ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT location_name, zipcode, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE zipcode = 10001 OR zipcode = 90210
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude, temperature, humidity FROM location_data INNER JOIN weather_data ON location_data.location_id = weather_data.id
SELECT * FROM weather_station;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_station;
SELECT station_name, installation_date FROM weather_station ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT station_name, recorded_at FROM humidity_data ORDER BY recorded_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_station WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT station_name, installation_date FROM weather_station ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT W.station_name, T.temperature, T.recorded_at FROM weather_station W INNER JOIN temperature_data T ON W.id = T.station_id WHERE T.temperature > 20 ORDER BY T.recorded_at DESC;
SELECT H.station_id, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM humidity_data H GROUP BY H.station_id HAVING AVG(humidity) > 50;

SELECT W.station_name, T.temperature, H.humidity FROM weather_station W INNER JOIN temperature_data T ON W.id = T.station_id INNER JOIN humidity_data H ON W.id = H.station_id WHERE T.recorded_at = H.recorded_at;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM location;
SELECT sensor_id, location_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT alert_id, sensor_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM weather_data
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE city='New York'
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT city, temperature, humidity FROM Location ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, installation_date FROM Sensor WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT reading_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM Reading WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message, timestamp FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Wind Alert'
SELECT city, country FROM Location WHERE latitude > 0.0 AND longitude > 0.0 ORDER BY country, city DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM Reading WHERE temperature > 25.0 AND humidity < 70.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, installation_date, city FROM Sensor s JOIN Location l ON s.location_id = l.location_id WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY installation_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message, timestamp FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Wind' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_id, city, country, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE city <> 'London' AND country = 'USA' ORDER BY city DESC, latitude LIMIT 5
